TopicTitle: can kerbnet waypoint be a target?

Articles.Content: i have a missile that i want to launch at somthing without me controling it. i also used a kerbnet waypoint in my career mode world, but i landed about 200 meters away, but then i got an idea: what if you can make your kerbnet waypoint your target. (it's goïng to help me a lot if this is added)
